data.text:
@killa_dinosaur We need a vaccine for cognitive dissonance, too many suffer from it. I guess you haven't bothered to read the Pfizer documents, ignorance is bliss. 
My fiance's healthy step brother died from the AZ but you prefer keep your head in the sand.

@LynnMor01381535 you mean there's very few confirmed cases in a group of people who would be extremely adverse to getting tested? wow, conclusive evidence right here.

i love that they call this a "conclusive scientific experiment" too, lmao how delusional can you be
@LynnMor01381535 Yeah nah. You are a liar and a fool really
@LynnMor01381535 Freedom Convoy = Occupy Wall Street. Remember "Greed is good" #FreedomConvoyCanada2022 #wallstreet #BidenIsALaughingstock

@tracy_collyer They weren't truckers, even the news, that you clearly watch, hasn't stated that a single trucker is hospitalized with covid. The only ones who are in the hospital were protestors harmed by police but I am sure you are perfectly fine with that.
